summary: "Guardians of the Galaxy" is a 2014 Marvel superhero movie about a group of alien criminals, led by Peter Quill (Chris Pratt), who steal a powerful artifact and go on the run. Directed by James Gunn, it's part of the Marvel Cinematic Universe. The film was a big hit, making over $773 million worldwide. It got praised for its funny script, great acting, and awesome soundtrack. Two sequels have been made since.
title: Guardians of the Galaxy (film)
